skillTree.localised_description: An Orc Shaman will ride a hog if he has to, but not because he finks it's a particularly good idea.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee (150s)

skillTree.localised_description: You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Channeling the energy of the WAAAGH! toughens the shaman.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
The savage orcs who hold the shamans in highest esteem coat them in ritualistic paint for protection.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
The enigmatic prancing and chanting empowers the shaman, but disturbs his fellow Greenskins.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Savage Orcs, Trolls, Rogue Idols, Wyverns and Giants units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Gork says smash 'em.

effects.description: Melee attack: +2 when in foreign territory
Melee attack: +4 when in foreign territory
Melee attack: +8 when in foreign territory

skillTree.localised_description: Green is best.

effects.description: Enable contact effect: "Banish" that lowers magic and physical resistance while increasing miscast chance

Charge bonus: +20% for Savage Orcs, Trolls, Rogue Idols, Wyverns and Giants units
	(Hero's army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Gaze of Mork"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Gaze of Mork Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Gaze of Mork Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Brain Bursta"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Brain Bursta Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Brain Bursta Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Fists of Gork"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "'Eadbutt Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "'Ere We Go"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Foot of Gork"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Foot of Gork Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Foot of Gork Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.
Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.
Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -1%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -2%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -4%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: -2 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -4 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -6 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: With the right amount of preparation, everything can harnessed to empower even the soldier’s mundane weapons.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +2% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +3% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: So great is this one’s raw power that the winds gust in unison.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee (150s)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Someday he's gonna be a Boss. Can you believe someday we'll work for 'im?"

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units
	(all units in army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: When you're clearly betterer than all the uvvers you need to shout the loudest, so everybody else knows you're the betterest.
"Dat a 'shroom in yer pouch? Give it! Give it to me!"

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Goblin and Night Goblin units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: You can't keep a good 'danca' down, especially when those drums start bangin'!

effects.description:
Leadership: -5 for enemy Lords and embedded Heroes
	(enemy armies in region)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

backgroundSkills.localised_description: When a Warboss needs someone to talk, he calls on this "Boy wiv da extra pointy sticks".
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Da boyz prefer teef, but enjoy some quality ‘shrooms when the mood strikes.
Oi, listen up yooz gits. Bring da shiniest bits back to me… or else.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: I love da dark places. Yoo can ‘ave so much fun with dem stunties in da dark...

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

Leadership: +5 during subterranean intercept battles
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: It just sorta happened. After a few scraps, da stuntie’s beard-hairs were stickin’ to my choppas.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dwarfs

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Whoeva’ brings me da best beard after da scrap gets a necklace o’ teef from my personal stash.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 when fighting against Dwarfs
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Dere choppa's bigga dan mine."
"Dat stabba is longa dan mine!"
